entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -19.9°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
